description: Try our easy to follow Super-Easy Spaghetti recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Super-Easy Spaghetti Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add onion, bacon, mushrooms, garlic and chilli and cook, stirring often, for 3 minutes or until golden. Transfer to a bowl and set aside. Remove pan from heat.

Add tomatoes, spaghetti, thyme, stock and cream to pan. Return pan to medium-high heat. Bring to the boil and cook, stirring and turning pasta with tongs, for 8-10 minutes or until al dente and liquid has been absorbed.
Return mushroom mixture to pan and reheat for 1-2 minutes. To serve, divide between serving bowls and top with parmesan and parsley.
